store_info.name: Amazon Voice Shopping
store_info.description: Your one-stop shop for everything - from electronics to books, fashion to home goods. Experience seamless voice shopping with Amazon's vast product catalog.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
products.description: Industry-leading noise canceling with premium sound quality. 30-hour battery life with quick charging.

products.name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Gen)
products.description: Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Audio, and Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking.

products.name: Apple iPhone 17 Pro Max
products.description: 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display. A17 Pro chip. Pro camera system. Titanium design. Action button.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra
products.description: 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display. Snapdragon 8 Gen 3. 200MP camera. S Pen included.

products.name: OnePlus Buds Pro 2
products.description: Adaptive noise cancellation up to 48dB. Spatial audio. 39-hour total battery life with case.

products.name: boAt Airdopes 141
products.description: Truly wireless earbuds with 42H playtime. Quad mics with ENx technology. ASAP Charge.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6
products.description: Advanced health tracking with heart rate monitor, sleep tracking, and GPS. Compatible with Android and iOS.

products.name: Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse
products.description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with ultra-precise scrolling and app-specific customizations.

products.name: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen)
products.description: Smart speaker with Alexa, improved bass, and smart home control.

products.name: Atomic Habits by James Clear
products.description: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones. #1 New York Times Bestseller.
products.author: James Clear

products.name: The Psychology of Money by Morgan Housel
products.description: Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness. International bestseller.
products.author: Morgan Housel

products.name: Project Hail Mary by Andy Weir
products.description: A lone astronaut must save Earth from disaster in this gripping sci-fi thriller from the author of The Martian.
products.author: Andy Weir

products.name: Levi's 511 Slim Fit Jeans
products.description: Classic slim fit jeans with stretch comfort. A modern take on the original 5-pocket design.

products.name: Nike Air Max 270 React
products.description: Comfortable lifestyle sneakers with React foam cushioning and iconic Air Max design.

products.name: Adidas Originals Trefoil Hoodie
products.description: Classic pullover hoodie with iconic Trefoil logo. Soft fleece construction for all-day comfort.

products.name: Prestige Iris Plus 750W Mixer Grinder
products.description: 3 stainless steel jars with powerful 750W motor. Perfect for Indian cooking.

products.name: Milton Thermosteel Flask 1 Litre
products.description: Hot & Cold 24 hours insulated vacuum flask. Rust-proof and leak-proof design.

products.name: Wipro Garnet LED Smart Bulb
products.description: 16 million colors, voice control compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant.

products.name: Nivia Storm Football Size 5
products.description: Professional quality football with excellent durability. FIFA Basic approved.

products.name: Boldfit Gym Shaker Bottle 700ml
products.description: Leak-proof protein shaker with mixing ball. BPA free plastic.

products.name: TP-Link Tapo C200 Smart Camera
products.description: 1080p Full HD home security camera with night vision and two-way audio.

products.name: Fossil Gen 6 Leather Watch Strap
products.description: Premium genuine leather replacement strap. 22mm width, fits most smartwatches.

products.name: AmazonBasics Microfiber Bedsheet Set
products.description: Queen size bedsheet with 2 pillow covers. Ultra-soft microfiber fabric.

products.description: Discover your reason for being and live a meaningful life. International bestseller.
